channel.title: Lucas Caldas: Portfolio on Lucas Caldas
channel.description: Recent content in Lucas Caldas: Portfolio on Lucas Caldas

item.title: Project X - Superstore Dashboard
item.description: In this project we’ll use streamlit for dashboard. For Machine Learning we can make use of regression to target continuous Profit values or classification on bolean Profitable values. key features: Dashboard, EDA, Supervised Learning The Dashboard is available at: [Link] Complete code is available at: Link Objectives: EDA Dashboard Classification Problem Target Feature: profit & profited Used Algorithims Logistic Regression Knn RandomTreeClassifier Phases: Data Preparation Data Analysis Machine Learning Algorithm Dashboard Creation Data Preparation Head, info, desc, null values, etc…

item.title: Project IX - Wine Classification
item.description: Datasets consists of red variants of the Portuguese “Vinho Verde” wine. Given the nature of the dataset we can make both classification and regression tasks. I’ll try to cluster the wine variants and predict wine quality Complete code is available at: Link key features: EDA, Clustering, Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning Objectives: EDA Wine Quality Prediction Wine Variants Clusterization Target Feature: quality Phases: Data Preparation Data Analysis Supervised Learning Unsupervised Learning Data Preparation Head, info, desc, null values, etc… This df have no null values, all numerical, the dream dataset (cry emote)

item.title: Project VIII - Music Genre Classification
item.description: As simple as it gets, make a Music Genre Prediction based on the data given. Complete code is available at: Link key features: EDA, Supervised Learning, Logistic Regression, KNN, Decision Tree, GradientBoostingClassifier Objectives: Music Genre Prediction Target Feature: quality Used Algorithims KNeighborsClassifier DecisionTreeClassifier Phases: Data Preparation Data Analysis Supervised Learning Data Preparation Normal procedure: head, info, describe, look for NaNs and Nulls, etc.

item.title: Project VII - Order Status Prediction
item.description: Boss Leathers is a small leather products business which has recently started selling its products on Amazon. Currently, it has around 40 SKUs registered in the Indian Marketplace. Over the past few months, it has incurred some loss due to return orders. Now, Boss Leather seeks help to predict the liklihood of a new order being rejected. This would help them to take necessary actions and subsequently reduce the loss.

item.title: Project V: Customer Personality Analysis
item.description: This project will use a dataset with a company’s ideal customers attributes. The dataset consists of the costumers basics information, including ID, birth year, education, marriage status and income. In this project my interest is try to understand the costumer profile and analyze their behavior. Being capable of clustering costumers by their interests is great to make products based on their expectations, allowing a further analysis on product mix. Considering that, i’ll cluster costumers based on their similarities and them show what to focus based on each cluster.

item.title: VBA I: Master Production Planning
item.description: Simple automated MPS (Master Production Schedule) sheet with use of forms and VBA. Content in portuguese. Available at: Google Drive Objective: Create an automated MPS System Functionalities: Product list with automatic ID generation and add/remove options. Checks for minimum stock and minimum lot production. Real time graph att. Allow use of both fix and variable lot options. Know Bugs: Alow creation of sheets with forbidden characters.

item.title: Project IV: Womans Clothing Project
item.description: In this project we’ll use an e-commerce dataset from a womens’s clothing store. The dataset constitute of some client information, a titled review with rating and some product intel. My interest here is to analyze the costumer profile, product performace and make a Sentiment Analysis with TextBlox. As an extra, I will also make a simple Word Cloud. Complete code is available at: Link key features: EDA, Data Cleaning, Data Visualization, Sentiment Analysis, NLP, Word Cloud Objectives: EDA Analyse customer preferences Analyse for correlation between product features and customer preferences Define what makes a good product Define what makes product get a good review Create a simple word count Phases: Data Preparation Data Analysis and Vizualization NLP and WordCloud Data Preparation Same as always, drop unused columns, fill NaNs, remove outliers.

item.title: Project III: Airbnb Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Data contais Airbnb overviews from New Orleans locations. It will be the first time I’ll try to make a NLP Sentiment Analisys and WordCloud. The dataset consists of the costumers basics information, including ID, location name, description, location and some host data. Complete code is available at: Link key features: EDA, Data Visualization, NPL, WordClowd. Objectives: EDA NLP WordCloud Steps: Data Preparation Data Analysis and Vizualization NLP WordClowd Data Preparation This step consisted of dropping unecessary columns and rows with NaN values.

item.title: Project II: Amazon Bestselling Books
item.description: In this project we’ll use an amazon dataset with the top bestselling books from 2009 to 2019. The dataset consists of book’s name and author, along with user rating, number of reviews, price, release year and genre. In this project i’ll be looking for correlations between books’ features. Complete code is available at: Link key features: EDA, Data Visualization, Seaborn Objectives: EDA Analyse for correlation between book features Steps: Data Preparation Data Analysis and Vizualization Data Preparation Dataframe without NaN values, outliers or inconsistent data, we can go directly to the Analysis Phase.

item.title: VBA III: Customer & Provider Registration
item.description: Using VBA and forms, this sheet can easily register customers, providers and products. Content in portuguese. Available at: Google Drive Objective: Develop a system with Customer, Provider and Product registration. Functionalities: Automatic ID generation Search with ID or Name Can att values Webscraping CEP Adress (requires SeleniumBasic) Requirements: Proper Webscrapping function will require the instalation of SeleniumBasic for Excel and ChromeDriver compatible with Google Chrome version.

item.title: VBA II: Stocks Data Webscrapping
item.description: Sheet with webscrapping capacity. Information is retrivied from Reuters Portal and then organized in sheets. Content in portuguese. Available at: Google Drive Objective: Create a sheet capable of colect internet stock data. Functionalities: Webscrapping stock data from diferent internet sources. Requirements: Proper Webscrapping function will require the instalation of SeleniumBasic for Excel and ChromeDriver compatible with Google Chrome version. You can find SeleniumBasic here and ChromeDriver here .

item.title: Project I: Netflix IMDB Scores
item.description: In this project we’ll use a database with multiples original titles from Netflix. Our main objective here is to verifiy relations between the titles characteristics and its score at IMDB. It will be a simple project composed of few steps Será um projeto simples composto por poucas etapas. Complete code is available at: Link key features: EDA, Data Visualization, Matplotlib, Seaborn Objetivos: Define genre a language popularity Most watched languages Runtime-Score Ratio Verify correlations between genre and other characteristics Etapas: Data Preparation Data Analysis Gráficos & Resultados Data Preparation The first step is to verify the integrity and characteristics of the database we are working on.

item.title: VBA IV: Free Cash Flow
item.description: Highly automated sheet developed during college. Based on a case study about the economical viability of a landfill construction. This sheet includes all steps from choosing the landfill location, financing of pre-implementation phase and creation of Free Cash Flow for actionists on different scenarios. Content in portuguese. Available at: Google Drive Objective: Create an automated MPS System Functionalities: Allows multiples datasets Positive, Pessimist and Realist scenarios Automatic Financing, Payback, VPL, TIR and MTIR calculation.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Lucas Caldas, aspiring Production Engineer. Have interests in Data Science and Logistics. You can find my résumé Here . Feel free to Contact me. Skills Excel: VBA experiece, macro development for process automation, webscrapping, data management and dashboard creation. Power BI
